Apprise.Description: Sends a message to a Apprise server.

Fields.Message-Help: The message to send to the Apprise server
Fields.MessageType-Help: The type of message to be sent
Fields.Tag-Help: A list of tags to send this message as, if empty it will be tagged with ''all''.

Apprise.Label: Apprise
Apprise.Description: A plugin that allows you to send messages to a Apprise server.

Fields.Endpoint-Help: The endpoint on the Apprise server, for example notify/apprise
Fields.ServerUrl-Help: The URL of the Apprise server
